name: ANRABESS Women Summer Mini Romper Dress Workout Tennis Active Sports Athleisure Outfits Built in Shorts Trendy Vacation

title: The perfect casual cute closet staple!
content: I absolutely love this romper dress!! It is so incredibly comfortable and cute! I have gotten so many compliments when I wear it out! It is great quality material and is so universal that it can be worn for a variety of events! You can dress it up or wear it casually and be active in it! It has large/deep pockets that are great for keys/small wallets. I bought a cropped white tank to go underneath of it which completed the look! There is a full-body romper with shorts that is fitted, but not too tight or restricting. It is the perfect length and it's straps are not uncomfortable at all! The color is so perfect and looks exactly like the picture! I would buy this again and again!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Super cute and comfy and makes the perfect casual fit! I‚Äôm usually a small and got a small. It fits great but looks a bit big/oversized. If I buy another I probably would go a size down

title: Cute and comfy but big

title: Verified Purchase
content: So easy to throw on and run errands, brunch, walk around town. Can easily be dressed up a bit with a jean jacket for brunch with friends. The color is beautiful and the dress is excellent quality. This brand makes good quality clothes!! I like to wear an undershirt with build in bra, so I don‚Äôt have to mess with a strapless. The built in romper provides amazing coverage at the arms, so a bra would be totally hidden. So much better than having to pay for the brand name, and honestly, I like this one more! Such an amazing value. The length is great and not mini at all. The under romper is stretchy, so it‚Äôs bump friendly too!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2024

title: Cute and comfortable.
content: The fabric of this feels good on the body, very soft and stretchy. The color (I chose brown) was perfect. However, this does not fit the same as the brand that it‚Äôs similar too. It fits much longer and wider. I took an XS, which is my normal size. Because I‚Äôm on the shorter side, this didn‚Äôt look as good and sort of like a bag. Good comfort though and it has built in shorts and a bra which is great for running errands or with my kids! I didn‚Äôt end up keeping though because of the fit.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2024

title: A wardrobe staple
content: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3‚Äù, 180 lbs, I ordered the Large. I think the material feels nice, but my only complaint is that I wish the length was shorter bc I‚Äôm short. I think it‚Äôs about 1-2 inches too long for me. I may have it altered. The underneath bodysuit has zero compression to it so it won‚Äôt help if you have an apron belly like I do. However the overlaying dress doesn‚Äôt seem the cling to my belly thank goodness. Also if you have a big bottom it will make it stand out. Either way, I think I will keep it regardless. I always have a hard time with rompers because of my bigger backside and I think this dress I can make work, as if I sized up to an XL, I think it would be too big up top. Definitely needs a longer sports bra or tank top underneath. Also I was hoping the material would be a little thinner for summer, bc it feels like a thick cotton.

title: So comfy and soft!
content: This is such a cute dress and such a good idea but poorly executed?  You have to take the entire dress combo off to go to the bathroom, which I knew before I bought it so I really can't complain.  It is not very forgiving unless you have a flat tummy, no curves and some acrobatic skills to get the dress off.  Maybe I was doing it wrong but to take the dress off there was not much "give" around neck line/straps to get it down and then you sat there naked because the whole point is you don't have to wear a bra with it.  I kept the dress but would never wear it in public because 1. no bra support 2. the nakedness in the restroom 3. did not hide my flaws.  I wasn't expecting a miracle but you always hope you will find that one amazing piece that makes you feel good about yourself.  This was not it.  Not the dresses fault.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2024

title: Not for plus size (insert sad face)
content: I am 5‚Äô0 and the dress hits mid-kneecap. I wear roughly a 12/14 in womens and 13/15 in juniors pants with a flat butt.  Tops are anywhere from Large to 1x depending on brand. I have a C-section belly with a mind of its own. The last time I was measured for a bra (VS about 2018) I was a 40C.  The large fits me really well. It doesn‚Äôt cling to my midsection. The bodysuit underneath is fitted but far from ‚Äútoo tight‚Äù. It doesn‚Äôt dig, the shorts don‚Äôt ride up. Don‚Äôt expect it to fit like shapewear. I‚Äôm not super fond of the design of the pockets, it reminds me of Pippi Longstocking. However I am thankful to have pockets.  This one did not have the bra inserts in the top like other dresses I viewed. It‚Äôs fine with a sports bra underneath.  I have never been a dress person but wanted something fun and different but still comfy for summer. It‚Äôs 97F as of about 15 minutes ago and I don‚Äôt feel overheated. I did worry about that given it‚Äôs two layers technically but it feels nice. I have worn it for a few hours today while running errands and the sweat marks are minimal. I got this as a Mother‚Äôs Day gift and will be getting more for summer. I could sleep in this if I wanted because it‚Äôs that comfy.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: When I opened the package the outfit was crumpled up like it was shoved inside. Then when I opened it up out of the package there was dog hair all over it, along with some persons hair. I'm pretty sure someone either used it once and returned it or tried it on and left it out, as the straps had been messed with and the inner lining was the wrong way. The outfit itself is cute and comfortable but I am highly disappointed in the quality assurance of returns. Isn't this why they have a used but in good/great condition option? Keeping as I don't want to deal with the hasel of returning and repurchasing, just going to wash it.
